


date: 2010-12-30 10:32:10+00:00


# Find IP ranges from an ASN

categories:
- Networks


`$ whois 217.136.0.0 | grep origin:
origin:       AS5432`

`$ whois -h whois.ripe.net -i origin -T route AS5432 | grep -w "route:" | awk '{print $NF}' |sort -n
